FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING ADDITIONAL BENEFITS TO SOLO PARENTS AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8972, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "SOLO PARENTS WELFARE ACT OF 2000"
ABSTRACT : HB03513 Seeks to amend the existing law to expand the coverage and benefits given to solo parents "WHO BEARS SOLO AND LONE PARENTING." Provides for various discounts on: a) 10%, children's clothings/materials from 0 - 2 y.o.; b) 15%, baby's milk, food and food supplements from 0 - 2 y.o.; c) 15% medicines/medical supplements/supplies from 0 - 5 y.o.
